key_risk_themes: ["High technical complexity in core features (DirectX viewer, HIPAA compliance)","Dependencies on external systems and specific skillsets","Maintaining data integrity across disparate systems (DB, File System)"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Initiate a technical spike for the DirectX rendering pipeline immediately to de-risk the DICOM viewer epic.","Establish a mandatory pair programming and cross-training schedule for the DICOM viewer and other complex modules.","Begin setup of a comprehensive DICOM interoperability test lab with multiple open-source PACS."]
